EmailTemplate.subject: Foreign currency transactions with SecurePay
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome to SecurePay
Get ready to start accepting payments in foreign currencies
Hi {!Application__c.ContactFirstName__c},
We are pleased to advise your application to enable foreign currency transactions with SecurePay has been approved.
What do you need to do now?
It can take a few days for the Dynamic Currency Conversion (DCC) feature to be live on your account*, in the meantime you can integrate the DCC feature. Please visit our developer documentation and follow the integration instructions. After you have integrated, you will be ready to start accepting payments in foreign currencies.
If you are interested in finding out more about the benefits of Dynamic Currency Conversion, visit our website.
Terms and Conditions
You can view a copy of the Dynamic Currency Conversion Terms and Conditions online.
Have a question?
We are always here to help. Call our support team on 1300 786 756 or email us at support@securepay.com.au
Our support team is available Monday to Friday, 8am to 8pm Australian Eastern Standard Time (AEST). We are closed on public holidays and weekends.
Thank you for using SecurePay. We look forward to continue working with you and helping you grow your online payments.
All the best,
The SecurePay Team
*DCC should be live on your SecurePay account within 24 hours however it can take up to 5 business days.
